pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for the Cancer Imaging Archive REST API // A wrapper for The Cancer Imaging Archive's REST API. The Cancer Imaging Archive (TCIA) hosts de-identified medical images of cancer available for public download, as well as rich metadata for each image series. TCIA provides a REST API for programmatic access to the data. This package provides simple functions to access each API endpoint. For more information, see https://github.com/pamelarussell/TCIApathfinder and TCIA's website.
